attributes.action: direct that official forms which require a signature within a box provide a box bigger than our signature.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
many forms - passport, driving licence for instance - are scanned into electronic systems.

The signature is required to be in a particular place, in a box.

Instead of providing a tiny box and getting a cramped and unrealistic signature, plus an unknown number of discarded or rejected forms because the writing has strayed out of the box, a box larger than all reasonable signatures should be mandatory.

This is a rule which might usefully be applied to commercial forms as well, however the PM is in a position to instruct the civil service to simply act and should do so.
